about_the_game:
You need a real brainstormer? Or maybe you need an addictive puzzle game? Dive deep in the puzzles of Fan Fun.
Find the way out of each level, while trying to consumpt, as least energy as possible while moving the ball through the level.
Collect all 3 diamond batteries to open the end level door and find a way to exit each level.
Try to escape from the level before you run out of energy.
Collect Power Ups, to turn on additional fan's and use them to help you move through the level. Teleport through the levels and change the gravity force to collect all level elements and reach the exit door...

  • 120 brainstorming puzzles.
  • Progressive Difficulty.
  • Addictive levels with teleport, gravity changing, power ups.
  • Accurate Physics.
  • Easy to play - press and release.
detailed_description:
You need a real brainstormer? Or maybe you need an addictive puzzle game? Dive deep in the puzzles of Fan Fun.
Find the way out of each level, while trying to consumpt, as least energy as possible while moving the ball through the level.
Collect all 3 diamond batteries to open the end level door and find a way to exit each level.
Try to escape from the level before you run out of energy.
Collect Power Ups, to turn on additional fan's and use them to help you move through the level. Teleport through the levels and change the gravity force to collect all level elements and reach the exit door...

  • 120 brainstorming puzzles.
  • Progressive Difficulty.
  • Addictive levels with teleport, gravity changing, power ups.
  • Accurate Physics.
  • Easy to play - press and release.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.6.6 or later
  • Processor: Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 1500 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OS X 10.6.6 or later
  • Processor: Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 2000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows Vista or Newer
  • Processor: Dual Core Processor
  • Memory: 1500 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DX9 GPU with 1GB Memory
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 110 MB available space

  • Processor: Dual Core Processor

  • DirectX: Version 9.0

short_description: Find the way out of each level, while trying to consumpt, as least energy as possible while moving the ball through the level. Collect all 3 diamond batteries to open the end level door and find a way to exit each level. Try to escape from the level before you run out of energy.
